name: Wild Lion Hunter 2016 - Jungle King Hunting Simulation 3d: Full fun free game
name_original: Wild Lion Hunter 2016 - Jungle King Hunting Simulation 3d: Full fun free game
description:
Be ready wild hunter 3d to hunt in the jungle . But , this time hunting is not as easy as it use to be in past because this time you are going to face most deadliest of all jungle wild animals "The King of the Jungle Lion". Lions are every where in the jungle and you have one the most modern sniper to sniper shot the lion. Hunt the Lion and be best sniper lion hunter.

Main Features:
*** Best hunting missions with 3 different regions and lots of addictive levels
*** real sniper 3d simulator controls
*** nice gameplay with realistic 3d designed environment
*** real sound effects
*** best shooting games with real top action for free
